link_id.name: link_id
link_id.description: The link ID of the link for which user wants to start the node maintainence.
link_id.validation_error_text: Parameter link_id only accepts integer numbers.

description.name: description
description.description: Brief description about the maintainence on the link.
description.validation_error_text: Parameter description only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

name: start_link
description: starts the link maintainence for a link
